MacOS Unix Bluetooth_scan.exe - Download

Utilizing Python's "Bleak" library to scan for nearby Bluetooth devices and extract detailed information, the Python script identifies between BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) and Classic Bluetooth platform types by analyzing service UUIDs. It collects critical details such as device name, MAC address, RSSI, and connection status. Additional data like transmission power and connection interval aids in debugging and optimizing performance.
MacOS Unix Video Format_scan.exe - Download

This Python script uses "pymediainfo" to extract metadata from video files, including video and audio formats, resolution, bit rate, and file size. It verifies file integrity with a SHA-256 checksum and allows users to process multiple files at once, saving metadata to .txt files for compatibility checks.
